lines.text: Drag the ball to match the graph

secText:
Essential Question:
How can we analyze motion using position-time graphs?

Enduring Understandings:
1. [OBJ:wb_math_position_time_concept:Identify the x- and y-axes], and [OBJ:wb_math_position_time_concept1:analyze slope in a position-time graph].
2. Analyze a [OBJ:expsec_c361:position-time graph for velocity and acceleration].
